title: ‘It’s a Disgrace:’ Teams Abandon Étoile de Bessèges in Protest Over Safety Concerns
content:
UPDATED: Several teams left the Étoile de Bessèges on Friday in protest of race conditions a day after a car turned head-on into the peloton.

Read the full article at ‘It’s a Disgrace:’ Teams Abandon Étoile de Bessèges in Protest Over Safety Concerns on Velo.
